Checks for a simple prototype PCB

üìù Capabilities

Check with the online PCB manufacturer's capabilities page. Approximate safe numbers are in brackets, but always better to check the capabilities page again!

üìÑ Specifications

Online order page options. Most common options for affordability are in brackets, but always check with the ordering page!
